short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help to Highlight Linkedin Share Box Text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linkedin Text Highlight Extension allows to add a toolbar to the LinkedIn share box editor. Hence the text can be customize in different format like Bold, Italic, Bold Italic and more.
